Definition.WordDefinition: Grandfather, NC (village, FIPS 27320) Location: 36.09850 N, 81.84753 W Population (1990): 34 (28 housing units) Area: 3.9 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Grandfather \Grand"fa"ther\, n. A father's or mother's father; an ancestor immediately after the father or mother in lineal ascent. [1913 Webster]
{Grandfather longlegs}. (Zo["o]l.) See {Daddy longlegs}. [1913 Webster]
grandfather n : the father of your father or mother [syn: {gramps}, {granddad}, {grandad}, {granddaddy}, {grandpa}]
